src: "Ne kemi tani minj 4 muajsh që nuk janë diabetikë, ndërsa më parë ishin diabetikë", - shtoi ai.
mt: 4 months ago we had no diabetics, but now we do, he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor i mjekësisë në Dalhousie University në Halifax, Nova Scotia dhe drejtor i departamentit klinik dhe shkencor në Shoqatën Kanadeze të Diabetit, kërkoi të tregohet kujdes, pasi kërkimi është akoma në fillimet e veta.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and director of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association, sought to be shown care, as research is still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Ashtu sikurse disa ekpertë të tjerë, ai është skeptik ndaj kurueshmërisë së diabetit, duke pasur parasysh se këto rezultate nuk kanë lidhje me personat që kanë tashmë diabet të tipit 1.
mt: As with other experts, he is skeptical of the diabetes cure, considering that these results have no connection with people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Të hënën, Sara Daniusi, sekretare e përhershme e Komitetit të Çmimit Nobel për Letërsinë në Akademinë Suedeze, njoftoi publikisht në një program radiofonik të radios "Sveriges" në Suedi, se komiteti, duke mos qenë në gjendje të kontaktojë drejtpërdrejt me Bob Dilanin rreth fitimit të Çmimit Nobel në Letërsi për vitin 2016, kishte ndërprerë përpjekjet për ta kontaktuar.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, announced publicly on a radio program of the Swedish radio station "Sveriges" in Sweden, that the committee, having been unable to directly contact Bob Dylan about winning the Nobel Prize in Literature for 2016, had ceased its efforts to contact him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Daniusi tha: "Në këtë moment nuk po bëjmë asgjë. I kam telefonuar dhe dërguar disa emaile bashkëpunëtorit të tij më të afërt dhe mora përgjigje tepër miqësore. Për momentin, është sigurisht e mjaftueshme "
mt: Danius said: "Right now we're not doing anything. I've called and emailed my closest collaborator and got a very friendly response. For now, it's certainly enough"
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Më parë, drejtori ekzekutiv i "Ring", Xhemi Siminof, theksoi se shoqëria nisi aktivitetin kur nuk mund ta dëgjonte zilen e derës së dyqanit të tij në garazhin e tij.
mt: Earlier, the executive director of "Ring", Xhemi Siminov, stressed that the company started the activity when it could not hear the doorbell of his shop in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Ai tha se kishte konceptuar një zile dere e cila funksiononte përmes WiFi-së.
mt: He said he had conceived a Wi-Fi-enabled doorbell that worked through Wi-Fi.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminof tha se shitjet u rritën pas shfaqjes së tij të vitit 2013 në episodin "Shark tank" ku drejtuesit e shfaqjes e refuzuan financimin e biznesit të ri (startup).
mt: 2013, Siminoff appeared on the show "Shark Tank" where the show's producers rejected financing his new business (startup).
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Në fund të vitit 2017, Siminofi u shfaq në kanalin televiziv të blerjeve QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminofi appeared on the QVC television shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: "Ring" zgjidhi po ashtu procesin gjyqësor me një shoqëri sigurimi konkurrente,"ADT Corporation".
mt: "Ring" also settled the lawsuit with a competing security company,"ADT Corporation".
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Edhe pse një vaksinë eksperimentale mund të ulë vdekshmërinë nga ebola, asnjë bar nuk katreguar qartazi deri më sot efektshmëri në trajtimin e një infeksioni ekzistues.
mt: Even though an experimental vaccine may reduce mortality from Ebola, no bar has yet clearly demonstrated efficacy in treating an existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Zmapp, një koktej antitrupash, tregoi në fillim se ishte premtues në këtë fushë, por studimet zyrtare treguan se ishte më pak i dobishëm për parandalimin e vdekjes.
mt: ZMapp, an antiviral cocktail, initially showed promise in this field, but official studies showed it was less effective in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: ZMapp shërbeu si kontroll i provës PALM, domethënë shkencëtarët e përdorën si referim dhe e krahasuan me tre trajtimet e tjera.
mt: ZMapp served as the control in the PALM trial, meaning the scientists used it as a reference and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Ekipi i gjimnastikës i Shteteve të Bashkuara e mbështet letrën e Komitetit Olimpik të Shteteve të Bashkuara dhe pranon nevojën e padiskutueshme të familjes olimpike për promovimin e një ambienti të sigurt për të gjithë atletët tanë.
mt: The United States Gymnastics team supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the undeniable need for the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Ne pajtohemi me deklaratën e Komitetit Olimpik dhe Paraolimpik të Shteteve të Bashkuara se interesat e atletëve dhe klubeve tona, si dhe të sportit të tyre, mund të shprehen më mirë nëpërmjet zbatimit të një ndryshimi kuptimplotë brenda organizatës sonë sesa nëpërmjet heqjes së certifikatave.
mt: We agree with the United States Olympic and Paralympic Committee's statement that our athletes' and our club's interests, as well as those of our sport, can be better expressed through the implementation of a full and complete change within our organization rather than through the revocation of our credentials.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics mbështet një hetim të pavarur që mund të hedhë dritë mbi mënyrën sesi një abuzim i përmasave të përshkruara me aq guxim nga viktimat e Larry Nassar mund të qëndronte i pazbuluar për kaq kohë dhe përkrah çdo ndryshim të nevojshëm dhe të duhur.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that could shed light on how a described abuse of such proportions by victims of Larry Nassar could have remained hidden for so long and support any necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: "USA Gymnastics" dhe Komiteti Olimpik dhe Paraolimpik i SHBA-ve ndajnë të njëjtin qëllim - ta bëjnë sportin e gjimnastikës dhe disiplina të tjera, sa më të sigurta në mënyrë që atletët të ndjekin ëndrrat e tyre në një mjedis të sigurt, pozitiv dhe motivues.
mt: "USA Gymnastics" and the United States Olympic and Paralympic Committee share the same goal - to make gymnastics and other disciplines as safe as possible so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and motivating environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Gjatë gjithë viteve 1960, Bërzezinski punoi për Xhon F. Kenedin si këshilltar i tij e më pas, në administratën e Lindon B. Xhonsonit.
mt: During the 1960s, Berzins worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and later in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Në zgjedhjet e vitit 1976, ai këshilloi Karterin për politikën e jashtme e më pas, shërbeu si Këshilltar i Sigurisë Kombëtare (KSK) nga viti 1977 deri në 1981, duke pasuar Henri Kisingerin.
mt: 1976 election, he advised Carter on foreign policy and later served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Si këshilltar kombëtar për sigurinë, ai e ndihmoi presidentin Carter në trajtimin diplomatik të çështjeve ndërkombëtare, si Marrëveshjet e Kampit Dejvid, 1978, normalizimin e marrëdhënieve SHBA-Kinë deri në fund të viteve 1970; Revolucionin Iranian që solli krizën e pengjeve në Iran në 1979; si dhe pushtimin sovjetik në Afganistan në 1979.
mt: As National Security Advisor, he helped President Carter in the diplomatic handling of international issues, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978, normalization of U.S.-China relations until the end of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution that brought the hostage crisis in Iran in 1979; as well as the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Ky film, me aktorët Emma Stone dhe Ryan Gosling, u nominua për të gjitha kategoritë kryesore.
mt: This film, starring Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling, was nominated for all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Goslingu dhe Stouni u nominuan përkatësisht si aktori dhe aktorja më e mirë.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated respectively as best actor and best actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Nominimet e tjera përfshijnë Filmin, Regjisorin, Kinematografinë, Kostumografinë, Montazhin, Muzikën e filmit, Konceptimin vizual, Montazhin e zërit, Miksimin e zërit dhe Skenarin origjinal më të mirë.
mt: Other nominations include the Film, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Music Score, Visual Effects, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dy këngë të filmit, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" dhe "City of Stars", morën nominimet për këngën më të mirë origjinale. Studioja "Lionsgate" mori 26 nominime - më tepër se çdo studio tjetër.
mt: 2 songs from the film, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars", received nominations for best original song. Studio "Lionsgate" received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Në orët e vona të ditës së diel, Presidenti i Shteteve të Bashkuara Donald Trump, në një deklaratë të shpërndarë nëpërmjet sekretarit për shtypin, njoftoi se trupat amerikane do të largohen nga Siria.
mt: In the late hours of Sunday, President of the United States Donald Trump, in a statement released through the press secretary, announced that American troops will be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Njoftimi u bë pas një bisede telefonike që pati Trampi me presidentin turk, Rexhep Tajip Erdogan.
mt: The announcement came after a phone call Trump had with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Gjithashtu, Turqia do të marrë përsipër të ruajë luftëtarët e kapur të Shtetit Islamik të Irakut dhe Sirisë, të cilët shtetet evropiane nuk kanë pranuar t'i riatdhesojnë, -sipas deklaratës.
mt: Turkey will also take responsibility for the captured fighters of the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria, which the European states have refused to repatriate, according to the statement.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Kjo konfirmon jo vetëm që të paktën disa dinozaurë kishin pendë, një teori tashmë e njohur, por siguron detaje që nuk mund të sigurohen zakonisht nga fosilet, si ngjyra dhe prezantimi tredimensional.
mt: This confirms not only that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already known, but provides details that are usually not available from fossils, such as color and three-dimensional presentation.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Sipas shkencëtarëve, në pjesën e sipërme kjo kafshë kishte pendë ngjyrë kafe në gështenjë dhe, në pjesën e poshtme, pendë me një ngjyrë të zbehtë ose karotenoidi.
mt: According to scientists, the upper part of this animal had coffee-colored bristles on the pistachio and, on the lower part, bristles with a pale or carotenoid color.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Ky zbulim na jep po ashtu një ide rreth evolucionit të puplave te shpendët.
mt: This discovery also gives us an idea about the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Duke qenë se pendët e dinozaurëve nuk kanë një bosht qëndror të zhvilluar mirë, i cili quhet "rachis", por ndajnë me strukturën e pendëve të sotme karakteristika të tjera, si gjembat dhe barbulat, studiuesit arritën në përfundimin se rachis-i mund të ishte një zhvillim evolucionar më i mëvonshëm se këto tipare.
mt: Because the tails of dinosaurs do not have a well-developed central axis, called the "rachis", but share other characteristics of modern tails such as vertebrae and ribs, researchers have concluded that the rachis may have been a later evolutionary development than these features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Struktura e pendëve të bën të mendosh se nuk ato përdoreshin në fluturim, por më tepër për të rregulluar temperaturën ose për paraqitjen. Studiuesit janë të mendimit se shembulli tregon një pendë të rrituri, jo një pupël zogu, megjithëse ky është bishti i një dinozauri të vogël.
mt: The structure of the feathers makes one think they were not used for flight, but more for temperature regulation or display. Scientists are of the opinion that the example shows an enlarged feather, not a baby bird, although this is the beak of a small dinosaur.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Studiuesit ishin të mendimit se, megjithëse ky është bishti i një dinozauri të vogël, mostra tregon një pendë të rrituri dhe jo një pupël zogu të vogël.
mt: The scientists were of the opinion that, although this is the tail of a small dinosaur, the specimen shows an enlarged beak and not a young bird's chick.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Një makinë-bombë që shpërtheu dje në mëngjes në rajonin e policisë në Gaziantep të Turqisë vrau dy oficerë policie dhe lëndoi më shumë se njëzet persona të tjerë.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and more than 20 others were injured when a car bomb exploded in the police region in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Zyra e guvernatorit tha se nëntëmbëdhjetë prej të plagosurve ishin oficerë policie.
mt: 17 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Policia tha se ata dyshojnë se përgjegjës për sulmin mund të jetë një militant i pretenduar i Shtetit Islamik (ISIL).
mt: Police said they suspect a suspected ISIL militant may be responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Ata zbuluan se funksionimi i Diellit bazohet në të njëjtat parime themelore si yjet e tjera. Përfundimet treguan se aktiviteti në të gjitha yjet e sistemit orientohej nga ndriçimi dhe rrotullimi i tyre dhe asgjë tjetër.
mt: They found that the Sun's function is based on the same fundamental principles as other stars. The findings showed that activity in all the stars in the system was directed by their illumination and rotation and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Dritësia dhe rrotullimi përdoren bashkë për të përcaktuar numrin e yllit Rossby që ka lidhje me rrjedhën e plazmës.
mt: Brightness and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of the star that is related to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Sa më e vogël vlera e numrit Rossby (Ro), aq më pak aktiv është ylli në përmbysjen e polaritetit të fushës së tij magnetike.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number (Ro), the less active the star is in reversing its magnetic field.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iuasaki u ndodh shpesh në vështirësi gjatë udhëtimit të tij.
mt: He often found himself in trouble during his travels.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Ai u plaçkit nga piratët, u sulmua në Tibet nga një qen i tërbuar, shpëtoi nga martesa në Nepal dhe u arrestua në Indi.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, mauled by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Standardi 802.11n operon në të dyja frekuencat 2,4 Ghz dhe 5,0 Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4 Ghz and 5.0 Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Kjo do ta lejojë atë që të jetë në mënyrë retroaktive në përputhje me 802.11a, 802.11b dhe 802.11g, me kusht që stacioni bazë të ketë dy radio.
mt: This will allow it to be retroactive with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has two radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Shpejtësitë e 802.11n janë shumë më të mëdha se ajo e paraardhësve të tij, me një shpejtësi teorikisht maksimale prej 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are much faster than its predecessors, with a theoretically maximum speed of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvalli, që është i martuar dhe me dy fëmijë të rritur, nuk i bëri përshtypje të madhe Millerit, me të cilin kishte lidhje kjo histori.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two grown children, didn't make much of an impression on Miller, with whom he had a connection to this story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Kur u pyet për komente, Miller tha se "Mike flet shumë gjatë seancës dëgjimore… Unë po përgatitesha, kështu që nuk po e dëgjova vërtet se çfarë po thoshte."
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said that "Mike talks a lot during the listening session… I'm preparing, so I'm not really listening to what he's saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Ne do të përpiqemi të ulim emetimet e dyoksidit të karbonit për njësi të PBB-së deri në vitin 2020 me një dallim të dukshëm nga niveli i vitit 2005", - pohoi Huja.
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by 2020 by a significant difference from the level of 2005," - Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Ai nuk caktoi asnjë shifër për shkurtimet e bëra dhe tha se përllogaritja do të bëhet në bazë të prodhimit ekonomik të Kinës.
mt: He did not give any figures for the cuts made and said the calculation would be based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Huja i nxiti vendet në zhvillim "të shmangnin mënyrën e vjetër sipas të cilës, në fillim, ndotet dhe më pas, pastrohet".
mt: The report urged developing countries to "avoid the old way of first polluting and then cleaning up".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Ai shtoi se: "Sidoqoftë, atyre nuk duhet t'u kërkohet të marrin përsipër detyrime që e tejkalojnë fazën e zhvillimit, përgjegjësinë dhe aftësitë e tyre".
mt: He added: "However, they should not be asked to take on responsibilities that exceed their stage of development, responsibility and ability".
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Grupi i studimit mbi Irakun paraqiti raportin e tij sot në 12:00 me orën GMT (ora mesatare e Grinuiçit).
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report today at 12:00 GMT (Greenwich Mean Time).
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ai paralajmëron që asnjë nuk mund të garantojë se cilido kurs veprimi në Irak në këtë moment do të ndalojë konfliktet mes sekteve, dhunën në rritje ose një përshpejtim të kaosit.
mt: He warns that no one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this moment will stop sectarian conflict, rising violence or a quickening of chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Raporti fillon me lutjen për një debat të hapur dhe arritjen e një konsensusi në SHBA për politikën ndaj Lindjes së Mesme.
mt: The report begins with a plea for an open debate and the achievement of a consensus in the United States on Middle East policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Raporti është tej mase kritik për thuajse çdo aspekt të politikës aktuale ndaj Irakut nga ana e pushtetit ekzekutiv dhe kërkohet një ndryshim i menjëhershëm në këtë drejtim.
mt: The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the current policy towards Iraq from the executive power and calls for an immediate change in this direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: I pari ndër 78 rekomandimet e tij është se duhet të ndërmerret një iniciativë e re diplomatike përpara fundit të këtij viti për sigurimin e kufijve të Irakut nga ndërhyrjet armiqësore, si dhe për të rivendosur marrëdhëniet diplomatike me fqinjët e tij.
mt: 1 of 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be undertaken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders from hostile incursions, and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Senatorja aktuale dhe Zonja e Parë e Argjentinës, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, shpalli dje në mbrëmje kandidaturën për presidente në La Plata, një qytet rreth 50 kilometra (31 milje) nga Buenos Airesi.
mt: The current senator and First Lady of Argentina, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometres (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Znj. Kirshner e shpalli qëllimin e saj për të kandiduar për presidente në Teatrin e Argjentinës, në të njëjtin vend që përdori për të nisur fushatën e saj të vitit 2005 për në Senat si anëtare e delegacionit të provincës së Buenos-Ajresit.
mt: Mrs. Kirshner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theater, the same place she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Debati u ndez nga polemikat mbi shpenzimet për ndihmën dhe rindërtimin menjëherë pas uraganit Katrina, të cilat janë etiketuar me humor si "Marrëveshja e Bushit për Nju Orleansin" nga disa konservatorë fiskalë.
mt: The debate was sparked by controversies over spending for aid and rebuilding immediately after Hurricane Katrina, which have been dubbed the "Bush Deal for New Orleans" by some fiscal conservatives.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kritikat e liberalëve për përpjekjen për rindërtim janë përqendruar te dhënia e kontratave të rindërtimit te personat e perceptuar se kanë lidhje të brendshme me Uashingtonin.
mt: Liberal critics of the rebuilding effort have focused on the awarding of rebuilding contracts to persons perceived to have ties to Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Mbi katër milionë persona shkuan në Romë për të marrë pjesë në funeral.
mt: 4 million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Numri i pjesëmarrësve ishte aq i madh, sa s'ishte e mundur që të gjithë të mund të ndiqnin funeralin në Sheshin e Shën Pjetrit.
mt: The number of attendees was so large that not all could follow the funeral procession to St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Disa ekrane të mëdha televizori u vendosën në disa vende në Romë për t'u mundësuar njerëzve teleshikimin e ceremonisë.
mt: Large television screens were placed in several locations in Rome to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Në shumë qytete të tjera të Italisë e në pjesën tjetër të botës, veçanërisht në Poloni, u bënë organizime të ngjashme që u panë nga një numër goxha i madh njerëzish.
mt: In many other Italian cities and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar organizations were made that were seen by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historianët i kanë kritikuar politikat e mëparshme të FBI-së për përqendrimin e burimeve në çështjet që zgjidhen me lehtësi, sidomos në çështjet e makinave të vjedhura, me qëllim rritjen e përqindjes së suksesit të agjencisë.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policies of concentrating resources on cases that are easily solved, especially on stolen car cases, in order to increase the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongresi e nisi financimin e iniciativës për aktivitetet e pahijshme në vitin fiskal 2005 dhe specifikoi që FBI-ja duhet të caktonte 10 agjentë për pornografinë për të rriturit.
mt: 2005 fiscal year funding for the initiative was initiated and specified that the FBI should assign 10 agents for adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Utapa arriti rezultatin më të lartë në shërbime, 70 vrapime për vetëm 41 topa, duke goditur 11 katërshe dhe 2 gjashtëshe.
mt: Robin Uppah achieved the highest score in services, 70 runs for just 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Gjuajtësit e pozicionit të mesit, Sachin Tendulkar dhe Rahul Dravid, u paraqitën mirë dhe realizuan njëqind vrapime së bashku.
mt: Middle-order bowlers Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid both appeared well and together ran a hundred.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Por, pasi humbi portën e kapitenit, India kreu vetëm 36 vrapime, duke humbur 7 porta deri në përfundim të shërbimeve.
mt: 36 laps were completed, losing 7 gates until the end of service.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Presidenti i SHBA-së Xhorxh U. Bush mbërriti në Singapor mëngjesin e 16 nëntorit, duke nisur një turne njëjavore në Azi.
mt: 16 November 2006: President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore this morning, beginning a one-week tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Ai u mirëprit nga zëvendëskryeministri i Singaporit Uong Kan Seng dhe diskutoi çështje të tregtisë dhe terrorizmit me kryeministrin e Singaporit Li Hsien Long.
mt: He was welcomed by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Pas një jave humbjesh në zgjedhjet në mes të mandatit, Bushi foli në një pritje zyrtare për zgjerimin e tregtisë në Azi.
mt: After a week of silence in the mid-term elections, Bush spoke at a formal press conference on expanding trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Kryeministri Stefen Harper ka dakordësuar ta dërgojë ligjin e qeverisë "Për ajrin e pastër" për shqyrtim, para leximit të tij të dytë, te një komitet i përbërë nga të gjitha partitë, pas takimit 25-minutësh të së martës me kryetarin e Partisë Demokratike të Re, Xhek Lajton, në zyrën e kryeministrit.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" for review, before its second reading, to a committee made up of all parties, after a 25-minute meeting with the leader of the New Democratic Party, Jack Layton, in the prime minister's office.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Lajtoni kishte kërkuar ndryshime në projektligjin e konservatorëve për mjedisin gjatë takimit me kryeministrin, duke kërkuar një "rishkrim tërësor dhe të plotë" të projektligjit të Partisë Konservatore për mjedisin.
mt: The party had sought changes to the environment conservator's bill during a meeting with the prime minister, seeking a "comprehensive and complete" re-write of the Conservative Party's environment bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Që nga momenti që Qeveria Federale ndërhyri për marrjen përsipër të financimit të spitalit "Mersey" në Devonport në Tazmani, qeveria e shtetit dhe disa deputetë federalë e kanë kritikuar këtë ligj si një pengesë në fillim të zgjedhjeve federale që do të organizohen në nëntor.
mt: Since the Federal Government intervened to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised the law as a barrier to the start of federal elections scheduled for November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Por Kryeministri John Howard ka thënë se ligji kishte vetëm synimin për të mbrojtur godinën e spitalit nga përkeqësimi prej qeverisë tasmaniane, duke dhënë 45 milionë AUD$ shtesë.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the law only had the intention of protecting the hospital from Tasmanian government deterioration, giving an extra 45 million AUD$.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Sipas buletinit më të fundit, të dhënat për nivelin e detit tregonin se ishte krijuar një cunami. Në afërsi të Pago Pago dhe Niue, ishin regjistruar disa aktivitete të caktuara cunami.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level data indicated a tsunami had been generated. In the vicinity of Pago Pago and Niue, some tsunami-related activity was reported.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Në Tonga nuk është raportuar për të plagosur apo dëme të mëdha, por energjia elektrike u ndërpre përkohësisht, gjë që siç thuhet i pengoi autoritetet e Tongës të merrnin paralajmërimin për cunami që është dhënë nga PTWC.
mt: No reports of injuries or major damage have been reported in Tonga, but the electricity was briefly interrupted, which as reported prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Katërmbëdhjetë shkolla në Havai, të ndodhura në vijat bregdetare ose afër tyre, u mbyllën ditën e mërkurë, edhe pse paralajmërimet tashmë ishin hequr.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii, located along or near the coast, were closed on Monday, even though warnings had already been lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Presidenti i Shteteve të Bashkuara, Xhorxh U. Bush, e mirëpriti njoftimin.
mt: President of the United States, George W. Bush, welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Zëdhënësi i Bushit, Gordon Johndroe, e quajti premtimin e bërë nga Korea e Veriut "një hap të rëndësishëm drejt qëllimit të denuklearizimit të gadishullit korean."
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the North Korean promise "a significant step toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Stuhia e dhjetë e emërtuar e sezonit të uraganeve në Atlantik, stuhia subtropikale Xherri, filloi sot në Oqeanin Atlantik.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, began today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Qendra Kombëtare e Uraganeve (NHC) shprehet se uragani Xherri nuk paraqet rrezik për tokën për momentin.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Hurricane Jerry does not pose a threat to land at this time.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Korpusi i Inxhinierëve të Shteteve të Bashkuara llogariti se 6 inç reshje mund të çanin argjinaturat e prishura më parë.
mt: 6 inches of snow could break the damaged retaining walls.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Lagjja Nëntë, e cila pa përmbytje të lartë deri në 20 këmbë gjatë uraganit Katrina, është aktualisht në ujë deri në mes, pasi u kalua argjinatura në afërsi.
mt: 9th Ward, which was flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently underwater up to mid, after levee was breached nearby.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Uji po derdhet nga argjinatura në një pjesë 100 këmbë të gjerë.
mt: 100 feet of gutter is leaking water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Administratori i "Commons", Adam Kuerden, shprehu irritimin e tij për fshirjet kur foli për Wikinews muajin e shkuar.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Kuerden expressed his irritation at the deletions when speaking to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Ai [Uellsi] na gënjeu në fakt që në fillim. Së pari, duke luajtur rolin sikur kjo po bëhej për arsye ligjore. Më pas, duke u shtirur sikur po na dëgjonte, deri sa e fshiu artin e tij."
mt: "He [Wells] was in fact lying to us from the start. First, by playing the role as if this was being done for legal reasons. Then, by crouching as if he was listening to us, until he erased his art."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Acarimi i komunitetit çoi në përpjekjet e tanishme për hartimin e një politike lidhur me përmbajtjen seksuale për faqen që përmban miliona media me licenca të hapura.
mt: The community outcry led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the page that contains millions of open-licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Puna e kryer ishte më tepër teorike edhe pse programi u hartua për simulimin e vrojtimeve të kryera mbi galaktikën e Shigjetarit.
mt: The work was more theoretical, although the program was designed for simulating observations made on the constellation of the Sword.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Efekti që po kërkonte ekipi mund të shkaktohej nga forcat baticore mes materies së zezë në galaktikë dhe materies së zezë në Rrugën e Qumështit.
mt: The effect the team was seeking could be caused by dark matter in the galactic halo and dark matter in the Milky Way's "doughnut".
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Ashtu siç Hëna ushtron forcë tërheqëse mbi Tokën dhe shkakton batica, ashtu edhe Rruga e Qumështit ushtron forcë mbi yjësinë e Shigjetarit.
mt: As the Moon exerts a pull on the Earth and causes tides, so too does the Milky Way exerts a pull on the star of the Archer.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Shkencëtarët arritën të dilnin në përfundimin se materia e zezë ka një ndikim në një materie tjetër të zezë në të njëjtën mënyrë si materia e zakonshme.
mt: Scientists have reached the conclusion that black matter has an effect on another black matter in the same way as ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Sipas kësaj teorie, pjesa më e madhe e materies së zezë rreth një galaktike ndodhet rreth galaktikës në një formë aureole dhe përbëhet nga shumë grimca të vogla.
mt: According to this theory, most of the dark matter around a galaxy is in the form of an aureole around the galaxy and is made up of many small clumps.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Njoftimet televizive tregojnë për tymin e bardhë që del nga uzina.
mt: Television reports show a white smoke coming from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Autoritetet vendore po i këshillojnë banorët pranë uzinës të rrinë brenda, të fikin kondicionerët dhe të mos pinë ujë nga çezma.
mt: Local authorities are advising residents near the factory to stay inside, turn off air conditioners and not drink water from the tap.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Sipas agjencisë bërthamore japoneze, në impiant janë identifikuar ceziumi dhe jodi radioaktiv.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Autoritetet hamendësojnë se kjo tregon se kontejnerët që mbajnë lëndë djegëse me uranium në fabrikë mund të jenë çarë dhe po rrjedhin.
mt: Authorities suspect this shows that the containers holding radioactive material in the factory may be leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll zbuloi tuberkulozin jashtëzakonisht rezistent ndaj barnave (XDR-TB) në rajonin KwaZulu-Natal të Afrikës së Jugut.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ai u shpreh në një intervistë se varianti i ri ishte "shumë shqetësues dhe alarmues për arsye të përqindjes shumë të lartë të vdekshmërisë".
mt: He expressed in an interview that the new variant was "very concerning and alarming for the very high mortality rate".
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Disa pacientëve mund t'ju jetë ngjitur virusi në spital, - mendon dr. Molli, - dhe të paktën dy ishin punonjës shëndetësorë në spital.
mt: 2 patients may have been exposed to the virus in the hospital, - Dr. Molli thinks, - and at least two were hospital workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
